Brookhaven.WWWQ: WWWQ FM 99.7, known as "Q100", is an Atlanta radio station airing a top-40/CHR format. It is owned and operated by Cumulus Media. The station broadcasts from studios in Sandy Springs alongside its sister stations WNNX-FM "Rock 100.5", W255CJ-FM 98.9 "99X", W250BC-FM 97.9 "OG 97.9", WKHX FM 101.5 "Kicks 101-5", WYAY FM 106.7 "News 106.7".
